trans-unit.source: Represents a connection point that is displayed on the outer edges of an activity designer on a workflow design surface.
A connection point appears as a small square on the edge of an activity designer surface.
It is used as a point where a Connector can originate on the activity designer to connect it with another activity designer.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value, and an integer.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> enumeration value that specifies where on the activity designer the connection point is located.
An index location of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
connectionIndex is less than zero.
connectionIndex is greater than or equal to the number of connection points on associatedDesigner.
associatedDesigner contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the activity designer to which the connection point belongs.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to which the connection point belongs.
Gets the bounding rectangle for the connection point.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
Gets the designer edge on which the connection point appears.

A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> that specifies the activity designer edge on which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> appears.
Gets the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.

An activity designer uses <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex%2A> to identify a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> in the read-only <xref:System.Drawing.Point> collection returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.GetConnections%2A>.
An integer that represents the connection index for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object.
The object to compare with the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.
`true` to indicate that the current and obj are equal; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>.

The hash code generated by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.ConnectionIndex"></xref> integer or the designer available through <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner"></xref>.

Gets a point that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.

The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the logical location of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
Performs all tasks required to render the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> on the activity designer surface.
An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the data
`true` to draw a highlighted connection point; otherwise, `false`.
